alert.note: Alert for Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 30 at 1:48PM CST until December 30 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN LEE...EAST CENTRAL ELMORE...NORTHEASTERN MACON AND SOUTHEASTERN TALLAPOOSA COUNTIES... At 147 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tallapoosa City, or over Tallassee, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Tuskegee, Tallassee, Notasulga, Waverly, Liberty City, Reeves Airport, Tallapoosa City, Loachapoka, Yates Dam, I 85 Rest Area, Roxana, Reeltown and Yates Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
